import socket

# Define the server details (match the C program's listening socket details)
server_ip = '127.0.0.1'  # Change to the IP address of the machine running the C program
server_port = 5005

# Seed array as a string, simulating the seed array from Raspberry Pi
seed = '575BF2C26E45C460'

# Convert the seed into bytes (hex format)
seed_bytes = bytes.fromhex(seed)

# Create UDP socket
sock = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_DGRAM)

# Send the seed to the C program
sock.sendto(seed_bytes, (server_ip, server_port))
print(f"Sent seed to {server_ip}:{server_port}")

# Receive the response (the generated key)
response, _ = sock.recvfrom(1024)
print(f"Received response from C program: {response.decode()}")
sock.close()
